plugins.name: Export to Denada
plugins.description:
Effortlessly create, customize, and refine HTML emails in seconds with Denada. Your brand. Your voice. Your rules. It's like magic.


This plugin is the easiest way to export your Figma designs into Denada.


How to Export Images to Denada:


  1. In Figma, select a layer to export, then right-click > Plugins > Export to Denada
  2. Name the image, paste in Denada API Token then Export to Denada
  3. The exported image will now appear in your Denada image collection


The image is linked.


  1. If you alter your image on Figma, just export it again and click "update available" in Denada


How to get a Denada API Token:


  1. In Denada, go to Settings (User must be a manager or higher)
  2. Click Create Token, Name Token
  3. Copy Token
plugins.tagline: Export your Figma assets to Denada's image library, in one click.

121997.name: Export to Denada
121997.description:
Effortlessly create, customize, and refine HTML emails in seconds with Denada. Your brand. Your voice. Your rules. It's like magic.


This plugin is the easiest way to export your Figma designs into Denada.


How to Export Images to Denada:


  1. In Figma, select a layer to export, then right-click > Plugins > Export to Denada
  2. Name the image, paste in Denada API Token then Export to Denada
  3. The exported image will now appear in your Denada image collection


The image is linked.


  1. If you alter your image on Figma, just export it again and click "update available" in Denada


How to get a Denada API Token:


  1. In Denada, go to Settings (User must be a manager or higher)
  2. Click Create Token, Name Token
  3. Copy Token
121997.release_notes: Allow exporting any layer, not just Frame layers.
121997.tagline: Export your Figma assets to Denada's image library, in one click.

plugins.name: Namer | Неймер
plugins.description:
Namer renames selected frames based on their position (top-to-bottom, left-to-right) on the canvas, ignoring layer hierarchy. Adds sequential numbers with your custom prefix: Prefix_1, Prefix_2, etc.


Неймер переименовывает выбранные фреймы по их расположению на рабочей области (сверху-вниз, слева-направо), игнорируя иерархию слоев. Добавляет порядковые номера с вашим префиксом: Префикс_1, Префикс_2 и т.д.


How to Use / Как использовать:

  1. Select frames → Open plugin → Click "Переименовать".
  2. Выберите фреймы → Запустите плагин → Нажмите «Переименовать».
plugins.tagline: Rename frames by position, not layers. / Переименовывает фреймы по расположению, а не слоям.

128205.name: Namer | Неймер
128205.description:

128205.tagline: Rename frames by position, not layers. / Переименовывает фреймы по расположению, а не слоям.

plugins.name: Maruco
plugins.description:
What is this?

Maruco is a plugin that provides rules and validation for component naming, helping you identify components that violate naming conventions and elements.


1. Selecting naming convention.

There are several conventions, let's select the best one for your project.


2. Entering naming elements.

Next, you can enter "words" that makes up the component's name.

Enter a comma between words to set multiple words.

Maruco guesses that the component's name is made up of three elements: a prefix, a middle word and a suffix.


3. Running validation.

That's all. Let's run the validation.
plugins.tagline: Effortless rule creation for component naming.

plugins.name: 数据生成图表可视化工具（专业版） Data Vision Chart Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin enables users to create beautiful and interactive charts directly within Figma. Whether you need a bar, line, donut, or pie chart, the plugin offers real-time updates and customizable styles for seamless data visualization.


Function Description

  1. Create different chart types: Line, Bar, Donut, and Pie charts.
  2. Customize chart styles with predefined themes or use custom colors.
  3. Easily add, edit, and remove data rows with an intuitive interface.
  4. Export generated charts directly as Figma frames for further design use.
  5. Support for multiple languages, including English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Hindi, Japanese, and Korean.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select the chart type you want to create.
  2. Input the required data and choose a predefined color scheme or customize it.
  3. Set the chart dimensions (width and height) as per your design needs.
  4. Click "Generate Chart" to create the chart frame in Figma.
  5. Customize the chart further by adjusting colors and data points as needed.


Notes

  1. The plugin supports dynamic data updates and real-time chart previews.
  2. Ensure that all necessary data rows are filled to avoid incomplete chart generation.
  3. You can switch between chart types to explore different data visualizations.


介绍

此插件让用户可以直接在 Figma 中创建漂亮且交互式的图表。无论是柱状图、折线图、环形图还是饼图，插件都提供实时更新和自定义样式，助力轻松进行数据可视化。


功能说明

  1. 支持生成不同类型的图表：折线图、柱状图、环形图和饼图。
  2. 提供多种预设主题配色，或使用自定义颜色。
  3. 直观界面，轻松添加、编辑和删除数据行。
  4. 将生成的图表直接导出为 Figma 的框架，用于后续设计。
  5. 支持多种语言，包括英语、简体中文、繁体中文、印地语、日语和韩语。


使用方法

  1. 选择您需要创建的图表类型。
  2. 输入所需数据，选择预设配色或自定义颜色。
  3. 根据设计需要设置图表尺寸（宽度和高度）。
  4. 点击“生成图表”按钮，即可在 Figma 中创建图表框架。
  5. 您可以根据需要进一步调整图表的颜色和数据点。


注意事项

  1. 插件支持动态数据更新和实时图表预览。
  2. 确保所有必要的数据行已填写完整，以避免生成不完整的图表。
  3. 您可以在不同的图表类型之间切换，探索不同的数据可视化效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Generate stunning charts for data visualization with ease

plugins.description:
整理整頓したいアイテム群選択後にこのプラグインを起動すると、同じ名前のフレームや、テキスト、シェイプ、画像などを自動的にグループ化して一覧化してくれます。作業スペースが整理され、過去のアイデアを見つけやすくなりますよ！


----


When you start this plug-in after selecting a group of items you want to organize, frames with the same name, text, shapes, images, etc. will be automatically grouped and listed. Your workspace will be organized and it will be easier to find past ideas!

plugins.name: WEMS for Figma
plugins.description:
WEMS is a powerful platform that transforms your Figma prototypes into fully functional websites or mobile app view in just a few clicks. Designed for modern creators and product teams, WEMS allows you to:


  1. Convert Figma designs into responsive websites or mobile app view
  2. Optimize pages with built-in SEO tools for website
  3. Add translations for multilingual support
  4. Integrate Lottie and Rive animations
  5. Embed MP4 or other embeddable videos (Youtube, Facebook, Vimeo, Twitch etc.)
  6. Support forms with inputs and data send to endpoint
  7. Integrate payment forms or buttons with own products
  8. Connect a custom domain
  9. Run A/B tests to experiment and improve
  10. Track performance with built-in analytics


With WEMS, you can go from design to deployment in record time — no coding required

plugins.name: ClientSim AI
plugins.description: ClientSim AI is a smart Figma plugin built for designers who want to practice and improve client communication, design decision explanation, and UX quality. Instead of exporting frames as images, the plugin reads your selected frame’s design structure — including layout, content, colors, and visual properties — and simulates a conversation with a virtual client.
plugins.tagline: Simulate client conversations and receive design feedback with AI-powered UX evaluations in Figma

140261.name: ClientSim AI
140261.description: ClientSim AI is a smart Figma plugin built for designers who want to practice and improve client communication, design decision explanation, and UX quality. Instead of exporting frames as images, the plugin reads your selected frame’s design structure — including layout, content, colors, and visual properties — and simulates a conversation with a virtual client.
140261.release_notes:
ClientSim AI is now live in its initial development phase! 🎉

This first version introduces core functionality including:

✨ AI-simulated client conversations based on your design

🔍 Heuristic evaluation using design properties (no image rendering)

📋 Support for client tone, persona, and feedback scoring

🧠 Fully text-based design analysis (no Vision API used)

⚠️ Note: This is an early release. For optimal performance:

Use smaller UI designs or individual sections for feedback

Avoid running on full homepages or complex multi-layered designs — token limits may result in errors

We’re working on optimizations for large-scale designs, token handling, and performance upgrades in the next version.
140261.tagline: Simulate client conversations and receive design feedback with AI-powered UX evaluations in Figma

plugins.name: TypoFix – Font Consistency Checker
plugins.description:
✅ TypoFix – Font Consistency Checker

Catch font mistakes before they catch your users.


TypoFix is a powerful yet simple Figma plugin that scans your selected text layers and instantly detects inconsistencies in:


✅ Font family


✅ Font size


✅ Font style (e.g., Bold, Italic)


✅ Fill color


✅ Missing fonts


✅ Unlinked or detached text styles


Whether you're a solo designer or part of a team, TypoFix ensures your typography stays polished, consistent, and ready for production.


🚀 How it works:

Select the frames or text layers you want to audit.


Click “Scan Fonts” – TypoFix uses your first selected text as a reference.


Instantly see all mismatched layers, clearly highlighted with ❌ and ✅ marks.


Export a CSV report for review, sharing, or documentation.


✨ Why use TypoFix?

No setup, no learning curve – just plug and scan.


Lightweight and fast – no internet/API needed.


Helps enforce design systems and style guides.


Perfect for handoff-ready designs or quick audits.


🔍 Pro Tip: Use TypoFix before design reviews or developer handoffs to eliminate common typography errors and maintain consistency across your design files.
plugins.tagline: Catch Font Flaws Before Users Do.

140026.name: TypoFix – Font Consistency Checker

✅ Fill color

Whether you're a solo designer or part of a team, TypoFix ensures your typography stays polished, consistent, and ready for production.


🚀 How it works:

🔍 Pro Tip: Use TypoFix before design reviews or developer handoffs to eliminate common typography errors and maintain consistency across your design files.
140026.tagline: Catch Font Flaws Before Users Do.

plugins.name: Palettly
plugins.description:
Palettly makes color palette creation effortless in Figma. Instantly generate harmonious color palettes from any base color and turn them into organized local styles with a single click. Preview your palette, customize naming, and streamline your design system workflow. No manual setup required. Perfect for designers who want fast, consistent, and beautiful color management right inside Figma.


What you can do with Palettly:

  1. Generate professional color palettes from any base color
  2. Instantly create local color styles for your Figma file
  3. Preview and fine-tune your palette before applying
  4. Use smart naming conventions for easy style management
  5. Save time and keep your design system consistent
plugins.tagline: Create color palettes and local styles instantly, with one click.

plugins.name: TextFiller
plugins.description:
TextFiller helps you update multiple text layers with just one click. Perfect for designers working with text-heavy interfaces, landing pages, or any project with repetitive content updates.


✨ Key Features:

  1. Bulk update multiple text layers in one click
  2. Preserves all text formatting (fonts, sizes, colors, spacing)
  3. Smart name-based matching - no more manual copy-paste
  4. Clear feedback on applied changes
  5. Simple format: just paste "texto1: Your content here"


📝 How it works:

#1 - Name your text layers as "texto1", "texto2", "texto3"...

#2 - Paste your content in the plugin using the format:

texto1: Your headline here

texto2: Your description here

texto3: Call to action text

#3 - Click apply and watch the magic happen!


Perfect for:

  1. Landing pages with multiple text variations
  2. A/B testing different copy
  3. Localizing designs to multiple languages
  4. Updating placeholder text with real content
  5. Design systems with text templates


Save hours of repetitive work. Let TextFiller handle the boring stuff while you focus on design.
plugins.tagline: Apply multiple texts with one click while preserving styles

plugins.name: ContentKit
plugins.description:
Design and prototype more efficiently with ContentKit

Use ContentKit as your central hub for all design content. Generate any kind of data with AI and sync your designs directly in Figma with one click. Collaborate seamlessly with your team like never before.


Try it in the playground file: https://www.figma.com/community/file/1500498135891868616


🤖 Generate content with AI: Bootstrap your prototypes with AI-generated datasets. Create realistic content for any scenario without having to start from scratch.


🎛️ Populate anything, not just text: Populate text, variant properties, component instances, and colors to update entire prototypes.


✏️ Create and edit directly in Figma: Build custom scenarios and edit data without leaving Figma. Define real-life situations and personas, then populate each screen exactly how you want it. No import roundtrips, no confusion about who has the latest data.


🔄 Keep your prototypes synced: Large prototypes often mean duplicated screens. Sync changes across all screens at once, so you never miss updating that one text box in the corner.


📁 Stay organized with projects: Sort your content using projects and screens.


👥 Collaborate with team and clients: Share datasets with your team and clients so they can contribute content while you design. Apply their changes with one click when ready.


🚀 Why ContentKit?

ContentKit provides better workflows, more seamless editing, and applies content more reliably than other tools. Variant properties, nested data and complex screens are no afterthought.


The ability to create and populate multiple columns allows working with detailed data and is perfectly suited for prototypes that need to be kept up to date across iterations.


📊 Additional Features

- Works seamlessly with nested screens and complex designs

- Import your existing data from CSV and Excel

- Built-in permissions and security controls


Learn more: intersectionslab.com/contentkit


Have feedback or ideas?

Contact me at kmueller@intersectionslab.com
plugins.tagline: Generate data with AI and populate text, properties, instances, and more…

plugins.name: TokenWizard
plugins.description:
TokenWizard is your all-in-one starter tool for building consistent, scalable design systems in Figma. With just one click, it generates structured design tokens as Figma variables, creates corresponding color, text, and spacing styles, and even renders a beautiful visual palette preview right on your canvas.


Whether you're building a brand system from scratch or bringing order to design chaos, TokenWizard adapts to your needs. Choose which token types to include (Color, Spacing, Typography), pick base colors from the UI, and skip the hassle of manual setup. No duplicate styles, no redundant variables — everything is smartly created or updated in-place.


Designed for UX teams, solo designers, and developers alike, TokenWizard transforms repetitive setup into a streamlined, creative experience — so you can start designing with structure in minutes, not hours.

accepted.name: Shoaib Khalid
accepted.description: Google Certified UX/UI & Product Designer with 12+ years of experience designing user-friendly interfaces.

plugins.tagline: Auto-Generate Figma Variable Tokens, Styles & Color Palettes with a Click

Whether you're building a brand system from scratch or bringing order to design chaos, TokenWizard adapts to your needs. Choose which token types to include (Color, Spacing, Typography), pick base colors from the UI, and skip the hassle of manual setup. No duplicate styles, no redundant variables — everything is smartly created or updated in-place.


Designed for UX teams, solo designers, and developers alike, TokenWizard transforms repetitive setup into a streamlined, creative experience — so you can start designing with structure in minutes, not hours.

plugins.name: Align Auto Layout
plugins.description:
MacOS shortcut setup:

System Settings → Keyboard → Keyboard Shortcuts → App Shortcuts → “+”.

App: Figma.

Menu Title:

Plugins->Align Auto Layout->Move alignment up

(repeat for down/left/right).

Press the desired keys, e.g. ⌃⌥W, and save.

Your new keys now trigger the plugin commands in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Instantly nudge auto-layout frames—left, right, up, down—for lightning-fast design workflows.

plugins.name: Pinnaflow Collections
plugins.description:
Figma CMS Table Generator helps you structure CMS data directly in your Figma file, and export it as a Webflow-compatible CSV.


With this plugin, you can:


🗂 Create CMS Collections

Define fields with types like Plain Text, Rich Text, Image, Number, Date, or Switch — all directly in your Figma UI.


🧩 Add CMS Items

Populate data using a form-driven interface. Each item becomes a variant within your CMS component.


📤 Export CSV for Webflow

Download a ready-to-import CSV with your data structured according to Webflow CMS standards.


🎯 Apply CMS Data to Design

Inject field values into selected Figma elements by choosing collection, item, and field — no copy-pasting.


⚡ Real-Time Preview & Auto Validation

Live feedback lets you know when your component is ready for export, and disables the export button if any structure is invalid.


🖼 Responsive & Intuitive UI

A clean and responsive layout, with tooltips, modals, and auto-tab interactions for seamless workflow.


🛠 How to use:

Create a Collection

Go to the "Create Collection" tab → enter a collection name → define fields → click "Create Collection".


Add Items

Switch to "Create Item" → fill in values for each defined field → click "Create Item".


Export to CSV

Select the CMS component → click "Export CSV" in the Collection tab.


Apply Data to UI

In "Apply Data" tab → choose collection, item, and field → select a text layer in your design → click "Apply to Selected Element".


✅ Best Practices

Your CMS component must contain a frame named “CMS Properties”, with text layers in the format:

Field Name | Field Type


When applying data, make sure the selected element is a single text node.


Only one CMS component should be selected at a time when creating items or exporting.


Use consistent field names and valid types for clean CSV output and Webflow compatibility.
plugins.tagline: Create CMS collections in Figma and export them for Webflow import

137944.name: Pinnaflow Collections

plugins.name: Harmony – Snap Any Design to Your System Styles
plugins.description:
Clean up designs by applying styles and variables from your design system!


This plugin automatically snaps every color, text style, spacing, and radius in your design to the nearest matching style token from your design system.


Disclaimer: the design styles and variables should be present in the file


Whether you’re importing AI-generated UIs or working with inconsistent layouts, this tool ensures pixel-perfect alignment to your style guide.


It identifies and merges duplicate styles, normalizes paddings and spacings to a consistent grid and applies variables also to the spacing padding from your design system-keeping your file tidy, lightweight, and production-ready.

Perfect for design system maintainers, UI/UX designers, and teams working with handoff-ready components.


✅ Matches colors using advanced perceptual comparison

✅ Aligns font sizes and weights to existing text styles

✅ Snaps corner radii and auto-layout spacing to your token grid

✅ Cleans unused styles with detailed before/after stats

✅ Works with selections or full-page scans


Please message any feedback or suggestion on sanjogbora@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Auto-apply your design system styles and variables to imported designs.

plugins.name: Iconize
plugins.description:
Transform any Figma design into a complete set of perfectly scaled Chrome extension icons in seconds.


Benefits:

  1. Save hours of manual work - No more tedious resizing and exporting
  2. Perfect proportions - Maintains design integrity across all sizes
  3. Professional results - Vector paths, text, and effects scale beautifully
  4. Chrome extension ready - Standard sizes (16px, 24px, 36px, 48px, 128px)
  5. Batch processing - Handle multiple designs simultaneously


How to use:

  1. Select your design - Choose any frame, group, component, or instance
  2. Run Iconize - Go to Plugins → Iconize → Scale to Icon Sizes
  3. Get your icons - Five perfectly scaled versions appear instantly
  4. Export to PNG / SVG and use - Icons are named icon16, icon24, icon36, icon48, icon128


Perfect for Chrome extensions, web apps, mobile apps, and any project requiring multiple icon sizes. Works with complex designs including vectors, text, effects, and nested elements.

accepted.name: George Valdes
accepted.description:
Post-architect
I like building, marketing, and selling outcomes

Iconize - Figma Plugin
Zenfiller - Auto Form filler
Zensets - Context engine

plugins.tagline: Instantly generate size appropriate icons at 16px, 24px, 36px, 48px & 128px from any design

plugins.name: Radix color palette
plugins.description:
Step 1: Enter a base color in the Accent section to generate a palette.

Step 2: Copy the accent scale generated below.

Step 3: Copy the CSS code from:

.root, .light, .light-theme { ... }

Step 4: Repeat Steps 1–3 for the Dark Theme.

Step 5: Create a collection in Figma with two modes named exactly: Light Mode, Dark Mode (Case-sensitive)

Step 6: Paste the Light and Dark theme CSS into their respective input fields in the plugin.

Step 7: Click the "Create Variables" button.

Step 8: Edit variable names as needed in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Copy Radix CSS code and paste it here to instantly add your custom palette variables to the file.

136337.name: Radix color palette

136022.name: SaveTXT
136022.description: For local file structures, sometimes you have to leave some information that there is a Figma file existing for a project. SaveTXT is the easiest tool to leave a local direction to your file.
